title: Brain vital signs as a quantitative measure of cognition: Methodological implementation in a care home environment
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Joshua Ighalo, Eric D. Kirby, Xiaowei Song, Shaun D. Fickling, Gabriela Pawlowski, Sujoy Ghosh Hajra, Careesa C. Liu, Carlo Menon, Sudhin A. Shah, Frank Knoefel, Ryan C.N. D'Arcy
